hipparcos.tools
Class StarFactory3d

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--hipparcos.tools.StarFactory
        |
        +--hipparcos.tools.StarFactory3d
public class StarFactory3d
extends StarFactory

For given alpha delta and d get all stars from the database in that area. Optional vlim may be given and hipOnly.
